# Akamai Guardicore Centra Security Overview
---

This workbook provides comprehensive visibility into your Guardicore Centra security environment, allowing you to monitor agent health, security policies, network connectivity, and security incidents. Use the various sections below to analyze your security posture and identify potential issues.
This section provides visibility into the health status of your Guardicore agents. Track missing agents and monitor trends over time to ensure complete coverage of your environment.

content.json: Analyze your network traffic patterns, identify your most active systems, and discover public-facing assets that might need additional security attention.

content.query:
let timeWindow = 24h;
let sourceConnections = GuardicoreConnections_CL 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeWindow)
| distinct source_node_id_g, destination_node_id_g, id_g, count_d, TimeGenerated
| summarize SourceConnections = tolong(sum(count_d)) by source_node_id_g
| project AssetId = tostring(source_node_id_g), SourceConnections;
let destConnections = GuardicoreConnections_CL 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeWindow)
| distinct source_node_id_g, destination_node_id_g, id_g, count_d, TimeGenerated
| summarize DestinationConnections = tolong(sum(count_d)) by destination_node_id_g
| project AssetId = tostring(destination_node_id_g), DestinationConnections;
// Get asset data directly with simpler approach
let assetData = GuardicoreAssets_CL
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeWindow)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_g
| project AssetId = tostring(id_g), AssetName = name_s, IPAddresses = ip_addresses_s, Status = status_s;
sourceConnections
| join kind=fullouter (destConnections) on AssetId
| extend 
    SourceConnections = iif(isnull(SourceConnections), 0, SourceConnections),
    DestinationConnections = iif(isnull(DestinationConnections), 0, DestinationConnections),
    TotalConnections = SourceConnections + DestinationConnections
| where isnotempty(AssetId) and AssetId != ""
| top 10 by TotalConnections desc
| join kind=leftouter (assetData) on AssetId
| project AssetName, Status, SourceConnections, DestinationConnections, TotalConnections, AssetId
| order by TotalConnections desc
content.title: ðŸ” Top 10 Most Active Systems (Last 24 Hours)

content.query:
let internetAssets = GuardicoreConnections_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h) | where source_node_type_s == "internet" | where destination_node_type_s == "asset" | distinct destination_node_id_g; let recentLabelData = GuardicoreLabels_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h); let max_ts = toscalar( recentLabelData | summarize max(sampling_timestamp_d) ); let latest_label_data = recentLabelData | where sampling_timestamp_d == max_ts;

latest_label_data | mv-expand static_asset = parse_json(static_assets_s) | extend static_asset_id = tostring(static_asset.id) | where static_asset_id in (internetAssets) | project TimeGenerated, LabelId = id_g, LabelName = name_s, LabelKey = key_s, LabelValue = value_s, AssetId = static_asset_id, AssetName = tostring(static_asset.name) | union ( GuardicoreLabels_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h) | mv-expand dynamic_asset = parse_json(dynamic_assets_s) | extend dynamic_asset_id = tostring(dynamic_asset.id) | where dynamic_asset_id in (internetAssets) | project TimeGenerated, LabelId = id_g, LabelName = name_s, LabelKey = key_s, LabelValue = value_s, AssetId = dynamic_asset_id, AssetName = tostring(dynamic_asset.name) ) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by LabelId, AssetId | project LabelId, LabelKey, LabelValue, AssetId, AssetName
content.title: ðŸŒ Internet-Facing Assets (Grouped by Labels)

content.json: Analyze security incidents and connection patterns to identify potential threats and policy violations in your environment.

content.query:
GuardicoreConnections_CL
| where unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(slot_start_time_d) >= ago(24h)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_g
| extend verdict = replace("_", " ", policy_verdict_s)
| summarize total_count = sum(count_d) by verdict
content.title: Connection Policy Verdicts (Last 24 Hours)

content.query:
GuardicoreIncidents_CL 
| where unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(time_d) >= ago(24h) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_g
| extend type = replace("_", " ", type_s)
| extend type = tostring(iff(type == "", "other", type))
| summarize count() by type
content.title: âš ï¸ Incident Types (Last 24 Hours)
content.noDataMessage: No incidents found in the specified time range

content.query:
GuardicoreIncidents_CL 
| where unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(time_d) >= ago(24h) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_g
| extend severity = replace("_", " ", severity_s)
| extend severity = tostring(iff(severity == "", "unknown", severity))
| summarize count() by severity
| order by severity asc
content.title: Incidents by Severity (Last 24 Hours)
content.noDataMessage: No incidents found in the specified time range

content.query:
GuardicoreConnections_CL 
| where unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(slot_start_time_d) >= ago(24h) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_g
| where destination_port_d > 0
| summarize total_count = sum(count_d) by tostring(toint(destination_port_d))
| top 10 by total_count desc
| extend Port = strcat(destination_port_d, " ", case(
  destination_port_d == 80, "(HTTP)",
  destination_port_d == 443, "(HTTPS)",
  destination_port_d == 22, "(SSH)",
  destination_port_d == 3389, "(RDP)",
  destination_port_d == 21, "(FTP)",
  destination_port_d == 25, "(SMTP)",
  destination_port_d == 53, "(DNS)",
  destination_port_d == 445, "(SMB)",
  destination_port_d == 3306, "(MySQL)",
  destination_port_d == 1433, "(MSSQL)",
  ""))
| project Port, Count = total_count
content.title: Top Destination Ports (Last 24 Hours)
